entry.title: Jota trolled by Celtic mate Alistair Johnston over Benfica game time
entry.summary: The Portuguese winger was on the books of his boyhood heroes before venturing to Scotland in the summer of 2021.

entry.title: Rangers on verge of signing former Celtic target as talks reach 'crucial stage' but Jack Butland deal hits snag
entry.summary: Rangers are closing in on the signing Ecuador international Jose Cifuentes after holding talks with the player's representatives over the past week.

entry.title: Dermot Desmond spotted with Ange Postecoglou at Celtic Park
entry.summary: The Hoops majority shareholder's son, Ross, was also pictured taking part in the conversation in the foyer of Parkhead.

entry.title: Steven Gerrard Rangers record dug out by Barnes over Celtic grievance
entry.summary: The Liverpool and England legend believes that black managers are not afforded the same opportunities as those who are white.

entry.title: Celtic vs St Mirren: Live stream, TV channel & team news
entry.summary: It's now the Scottish champions' turn to play on home soil as they welcome St Mirren to the east end of Glasgow this weekend.

entry.title: Celtic transfer decision on Liam Scales on hold until the summer
entry.summary: The defender has been an impressive figure in the Dons backline this season, particularly since Barry Robson took over the side in late January.

entry.title: Ange in Celtic tribute to key duo he was determined to stick with
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou may be the frontman, but the Celtic manager is adamant his backroom team deserve just as much limelight.

entry.title: The Ange Postecoglou 'boom moment' that kick-started success
entry.summary: There is a certain art to becoming comfortable in the uncomfortable - the Celtic boss is a master.

entry.title: Ange Postecoglou addresses Liam Scales' Celtic future and hails the 'outstanding people' behind his success
entry.summary: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has applauded Liam Scales’ efforts on loan for Aberdeen and revealed a decision on the player’s future is imminent.

entry.title: How Rangers plan to overtake Celtic as new CEO reveals strategy to become 'dominant club in Scotland'
entry.summary: New Rangers chief executive James Bisgrove has revealed that plans are in place for the club to become the dominant force in Scottish football across the next two years.

entry.title: Mum of Glasgow Rangers fan who died at 19 plans special tribute
entry.summary: An old firm charity match is set to take place this weekend in memory of a Glasgow teen who lost her life in 2020.

entry.title: Celtic v Inverness: MSPs demand more answers over Scottish Cup final kick-off change as SFA response branded 'less than satisfactory'
entry.summary: MSPs have written to the Scottish FA for a second time to demand more answers after being left “disappointed” with the response received to questions relating to the decision to change kick-off time for next month's Scottish Cup final between Celtic and Inverness Caledonian Thistle.

entry.title: Celtic transfers: 5 players linked with move to Scottish champions as Ange Postecoglou targets 'another level'
entry.summary: How do Celtic go to the next level? They are on course for the treble, following on from the double last season, and it is difficult to look at Ange Postecoglou’s strongest XI and pinpoint an area that should be upgraded or would be straightforward to upgrade.

entry.title: Celtic transfers: Ange Postecolgou admits 'players will move on' as 18-goal target addresses speculation
entry.summary: Celtic will be looking to complete a treble in the coming weeks but already there will be a focus on the summer and planning for their title defence but also the Champions League group stage where they will look to improve on from this campaign.

entry.title: Ex-Celtic boss Neil Lennon nears management return at Olympiakos
entry.summary: The former Parkhead manager is reportedly in the running to take over at the Greek giants.

entry.title: Celtic winger Jota on how Fernando Chalana inspired Rangers dink
entry.summary: IT was a goal fit to grace any game, and one that ultimately saw Jota win the PFA Scotland Goal of the Season Award.

entry.title: Rangers' U18s earn revenge on Celtic in comfortable derby day win
entry.summary: Second-half goals from Chris Eadie and Findlay Curtis were enough to secure a 2-0 victory over their rivals during the showdown.

entry.title: Ex-Rangers star helps out Inverness with pre-Celtic match friendly
entry.summary: Caley Thistle will take on Ange Postecoglou's side on Saturday, June 3 at Hampden to fight it out for the final silverware of the campaign.

entry.title: Watch Jason Cummings' Rangers reaction to win over Celtic
entry.summary: A packed-out Ibrox celebrated in the sun, as the Gers team sent all of their supporters around the country and the world crazy.

entry.title: In-stadium announcements on VAR rulings could be approved in leagues by year-end
entry.summary: Leagues around the world, including the Scottish Premiership, could be given the green light to trial referees making in-stadium announcements to explain decisions after VAR reviews before the end of the year, but broadcasting live discussions on decisions appears less likely, The Scotsman has learned.

entry.title: Xavier Mbuyamba addresses transfer speculation amid Celtic links
entry.summary: The Volendam centre-back is reportedly on the radar of Ange Postecoglou ahead of the transfer window opening up.

entry.title: Celtic switch title decider venue and look to create another record
entry.summary: Celtic Women will play their final game of the SWPL season at Celtic Park after the club decided to switch the venue for what could be a title celebration.

entry.title: 'Brilliant' Celtic boss Postecoglou should be targeted by Tottenham
entry.summary: Former Spurs midfielder Jamie O'Hara reckons Tottenham should appoint Postecoglou in the summer.

entry.title: How Ange Postecoglou will strengthen Celtic for Champions League as Neil Lennon in 'few will be leaving' claim
entry.summary: Neil Lennon believes Ange Postecoglou will look to “add a bit of physicality” to his Celtic side ahead for their Champions League campaign next season.

entry.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers star 'agreement' with giants, Celtic eye 6ft5in defender, Beale target boost, Hearts ace deal admission
entry.summary: While there are three rounds of the Scottish Premiership remaining, plus the Scottish Cup final where Celtic will be aiming to complete a treble, there is a fascination about the summer transfer window with a number of clubs set for a rebuild or significant tweaks to their squad.

entry.title: Neil Lennon delivers Celtic transfer verdict as he predicts departures
entry.summary: The former Parkhead boss expects Ange Postecoglou to add to his squad in the summer.

entry.title: The 4 SFWA Scottish Young Player of the Year nominees - including Celtic loan star and Euro-linked Well ace
entry.summary: St Johnstone loan star Adam Montgomery and Motherwell’s emerging teenage ace Max Johnston have been nominated for the Scottish Football Writers’ Association’s SPFL Young Player of the Year award.

entry.title: The day Celtic icon Kyogo tormented Ange's team with brilliant display
entry.summary: The Parkhead pair were big winners at Sunday's PFA Scotland awards night in Glasgow.

entry.title: Ange and Kyogo react to Celtic awards as striker drops hint on future
entry.summary: The Parkhead manager and star striker were victorious at Sunday's PFA Scotland awards night.

entry.title: Xavier Mbuyamba Celtic transfer links emerge as club 'scouts' defender
entry.summary: The 21-year-old has already earned comparisons to former Hoops far Virgil van Dijk in the budding years of his career.

entry.title: Kyogo Furuhashi, Celtic and summer 'dilemma' - Euro interest, deserved award haul, incredible goal stats
entry.summary: It was Jota’s strike against Rangers in the first Old Firm clash of the season which won Celtic’s – and PFA Scotland’s – goal of the season award. But if there was a goal which was pure Celtic, which truly summed up the campaign for Ange Postecoglou’s treble-chasing league champions it is Kyogo Furuhashi’s strike against Hearts at Tynecastle Park last weekend.

entry.title: Smokin' hot Billy Gilmour - Scottish tall tales and what recent Brighton rebirth means for Rangers and Celtic chat and national team
entry.summary: It is a rebirth for the nation. It is no stretch to suggest that the delirium generated within Billy Gilmour’s Scottish homeland two years ago over his long-predicted emergence assumed astronomical proportions.

entry.title: Smokin' hot Billy Gilmour - Scottish tall tales and what recent Brighton birth means for Rangers and Celtic chat and national team
entry.summary: It is a rebirth for the nation. It is no stretch to suggest that the delirium generated within Billy Gilmour’s Scottish homeland two years ago over his long-predicted emergence assumed astronomical proportions.

entry.title: Dermot Gallagher delivers Rangers vs Celtic 'handball' penalty verdict
entry.summary: The incident wasn't checked by Greg Aitken on VAR, despite the strong protestation from those in green and white.

entry.title: Why Aberdeen are not following Rangers, Celtic and Hearts in B team plan
entry.summary: Aberdeen have decided against entering a ‘B’ team into a proposed new Scottish Conference League.

entry.title: New Celtic kit leaked by Adidas
entry.summary: An image of the new kit was posted by Adidas with the shirt listed for £70.

entry.title: Celtic urged to reinforce in wake of Rangers loss as one player singled out as 'disappointment'
entry.summary: Former Celtic forward Kris Commons has urged the club to strengthen defensively in the wake of losing the final Old Firm derby 3-0 to Rangers.

entry.title: Celtic hoover up main awards with four gongs, Rangers land two - full list of PFA winners
entry.summary: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou and his free-scoring forward Kyogo Furuhashi picked the main gongs at the PFA Scotland award ceremony on Sunday evening.

entry.title: Watch Jota's Celtic vs Rangers strike named goal of the season
entry.summary: The winger collected goal of the season gongs at the PFA awards as well as his own club awards night.

entry.title: 'Evolution not revolution' - Rangers loss sparks Celtic signing demand
entry.summary: Former Celtic winger Kris Commons reckons Ange Postecoglou must sign a central defender in the summer.

entry.title: Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou named PFA Scotland manager of the year
entry.summary: The Bhoys are on track for a domestic treble.

entry.title: Tony Ralston explains why Celtic 'credit in the bank' doesn't matter
entry.summary: The right-back says Celtic's performance at Ibrox on Saturday was 'not acceptable'.

entry.title: Rangers-Celtic final word: The magnificent Cantwell, Postecoglou's deputies show weakness, Morelos and Lovelace
entry.summary: In a season of severe disappointment for Rangers, what happened over the weekend can at least give some optimism for the 2023/24 campaign.

entry.title: SWPL title race goes to gripping final day - Glasgow City hold slender advantage over Rangers and Celtic
entry.summary: The SWPL title race will go down to the final round of fixtures next weekend with Glasgow City holding the advantage after a 2-1 victory over Partick Thistle.

entry.title: Kyogo given Premier League seal of approval by ex-Celtic boss
entry.summary: The former Celtic boss would have loved to have worked with Kyogo at Parkhead.

entry.title: Cameron Carter-Vickers in 'positive' Celtic injury update
entry.summary: The defender will not play again this season after having surgery on a knee injury.

entry.title: 'A team like Leeds' - Ange Postecoglou Premier League job claim as pundit expresses Celtic hope
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou is a “good enough” manager for the Premier League and will want to manage in the English top-flight, according to Pat Nevin.

entry.title: Cameron Carter-Vickers gives update on knee surgery but no date set for Celtic return
entry.summary: Celtic defender Cameron Carter-Vickers has not a put a timeline on his return to first-team action after having knee surgery but says he is feeling “positive” about his recovery.

entry.title: Rangers-Celtic reaction: Beale will mount title challenge; Pope pilloried; Barbour’s bizarre Sky take
entry.summary: It felt as if a collective weight was lifted off Rangers as a club courtesy of Michael Beale’s men conjuring up a zestful 3-0 slapdown of their Celtic rivals. It certainly provided respite for the Ibrox manager, and food for thought.

entry.title: Meet the Albion Rovers youngster keeping company with Celtic and Rangers
entry.summary: Charlie Reilly is the poster boy for the power of perseverance. Rubbing shoulders the other day with a clutch of Celtic players and Motherwell striker Kevin van Veen as one of the nominees for the PFA Scotland awards, the Albion Rovers forward looked as incongruous as a penguin in the Sahara.

entry.title: SPWL set for frantic finale with three-way battle for title
entry.summary: Two rounds of fixtures to go, starting today, and an unprecedented three sides can win the top tier title.
